note.p: Birth: Nottingham Place, Marylebone, London, England (06 April 1806)
Death: At his lodgings in Soho Square, London (31 May 1856)
Burial: St John's parish churchyard, Hampstead, London
Career: Merchant; thrown from his horse while riding near Norwood and died of a fractured skull.
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1856-1857 vol 8 pp 275-279
